channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Monk Movie Wasn’t Perfect, But It Did 1 Important Thing Better Than Most Other Modern Movies
item.description: Mr. Monk's Last Case had its flaws, but it handled one controversial and sensitive topic so well that it beat many other modern movies about COVID-19.

item.title: Weapons Trailer: Runaway Children Have Never Seemed So Terrifying In Zach Cregger's Barbarian Follow-Up
item.description: The creepy first teaser trailer has arrived for Weapons, the new horror movie from Barbarian director Zach Cregger that stars Josh Brolin.

item.title: John Wayne Rejected A Classic Stanley Kubrick Movie, Despite The Role Being Written With Him In Mind
item.description: One character in an iconic Stanley Kubrick movie was written with John Wayne in mind, but the actor turned down the classic role immediately.
